title: Covid-19 Vaccine Frequently Asked Questions
content:
People who are moderately or severely immunocompromised should get at least 2 doses of 2024â€“2025 COVID-19 vaccine 6 months apart. They may also get more age-appropriate doses, beyond two doses at least 2 months apart, after talking to a healthcare provider.
People can self-confirm as moderately or severely immunocompromised. This means they do NOT need documentation to receive a COVID-19 vaccination they are eligible for.
